hooks.command: for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.lua) stylua "$f" ;; *.yml|*.yaml) yamlfmt "$f" ;; esac; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.yml|*.yaml) ansible-lint "$f" 2>/dev/null || true ;; esac; done

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then if git diff --cached --name-only 2>/dev/null | xargs grep -l -E '(password|secret|api_key|token)\s*=' 2>/dev/null; then echo 'ERROR: Possible secrets detected in staged files' >&2; exit 1; fi; fi
